A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Basically \"Space Balls 2\"\, rightfully making fun of the previous movie\, ep 7. The way it destroys everything that the previous \"film\" has established\, warms my heart\, as there was nothing to be sad about. Technically\, it does to Ep 7 exactly what Ep 7 did to SW franchise. But as a movie it's as much a failure as its predecessor\, on every level.
